title: timotron
author: timotron
content: Trooper Bounty ProgramDiscordInvite friends and contact to Trooper Discord and earn!Join our Discord - https://discord.gg/NTUdHWQJWbGenerate a invite link in our discord.Invite friends and followers. You need to have an account in Trooper website: https://trooper-jobs.com/Reply in this threadUse this format: I'm joining the Discord invite bounty.And fill this form once you have joined discord and created your unique invite link:https://forms.gle/oUd9LyxfPLqK9q6W9Rewards:Total 100.000 $Medal  - Valued at $10.000Depending on the amount of invites, if you invite:10 to 49 - 200 $Medal - $2050 to 99 - 500 $Medal - $5099 to 299 - 1000 $Medal - $100300 to 599 - 3000 $Medal - $300600 to 999 - 5000 $Medal - $5001000 to 1499 - 10000 $Medal - $1000more than 1500 - 15000 $Medal - $1500TwitterFollow us in Twitter - https://twitter.com/TrooperjobsLike and retweet the pinned tweet - https://twitter.com/Trooperjobs/status/1652251714563502081Tweet about Trooper, create a tweet with this text and tag 3 friends: Incredible new gaming ecosystem design to make gaming a viable career! Sign up now! https://trooper-jobs.com/auth @Trooperjobs #Gaming #Trooper #Gamers You need to have an account in Trooper website: https://trooper-jobs.com/Reply in this thread when you completed the 3 tasks:Use this format: I just completed the Twitter tasks.And fill this form once you have completed all 3 tasks:https://forms.gle/ZvuxZeFDajSF72qw7Rewards:Total 50.000 $Medal  - Valued at $5.000Depending on your amount of followers, if you have:100 to 490 - 100 $Medal - $10500 to 990 - 400 $Medal - $401000 to 2999 - 700 $Medal - $703000 to 5999 - 1500 $Medal - $1506000 to 9999 - 3000 $Medal - $30010000 to 14999 - 5000 $Medal - $500more than 15000 - 7500 $Medal - $750MemesMemes creations and posting on Twitter:Create a meme with this ideas (or similar):Gamers getting hired to play video games.Trooper and gamified education.Create meme for different reasons to hire gamers.Gamers dream coming to reality because of in game earnings.How in-game jobs revolutionize gaming.How easy it is to find team mates in Trooper. Create memes which let Trooper shine, be funny! You need to have an account in Trooper website: https://trooper-jobs.com/Post your Meme in Twitter tagging @TrooperjobsReply in this threadUse this format: I just created this incredible meme about Trooper: "ADD you MEME"  - Add link to tweet posting the meme"  (TAG @Trooperjobs in your tweet)And fill this form once you have joined discord and created your unique invite link:https://forms.gle/oUd9LyxfPLqK9q6W9Rewards:Total 50.000 $Medal  - Valued at $5.000Depending on the amount of likes:All memes 50 $Medal - $5Memes with 20 to 99 likes - 200 $Medal - $20Memes with 99 to 199 likes - 500 $Medal - $50Memes with 200 to 699 likes- 1000 $Medal - $100Memes with 700 to 1699 likes - 3000 $Medal - $300Memes with 1700 to 3499 likes - 5000 $Medal - $500more than 3500 likes- 7500 $Medal - $750Trooper links - Join our community now!                                                                          Website - Hire, Play, Earn - Join now to earn the $Medal airdrop.                                                                         Discord  - Join the community and participate in tournaments!.                                                                         Twitter - Follow us for the last news!.                                                                         Bitcoin talk announcement - Hire, Play, Earn. [/list][/list][/list][/list][/list]
